title: [K-12] Blended Digital Education for Enhancing Personal Tutor Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding basic concepts of one-on-one university tutoring
context.additional_context: Conducted in a smartphone-centric limited technology environment, applying a blended approach combining real-time lectures with self-directed digital learning

learning_goals: Explain the policies, structure, and procedures of individual tutoring with over 80% accuracy
Practice effective communication strategies with tutees through role-playing at least three times and incorporate feedback
Apply problem-solving solutions to individual tutoring cases by completing interactive activities in digital learning materials

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
